item.title: 德国提醒不要谈论北溪管道复兴问题
item.description: 乌克兰可能实现停火的前景引发了人们对达成和平协议后欧洲未来能源结构的疑问，一些东欧国家呼吁恢复进口俄罗斯天然气并重建北溪管道。【原文：Prospect of a potential ceasefire in Ukraine has raised questions about Europe’s future energy mix in the event of a peace deal, with some eastern European countries calling for the resumption of Russian gas imports and reconstruction of the Nord Stream pipelines】

item.title: Equinor 启动 Halten East 天然气开发项目
item.description: Halten East 的六个现有发现蕴含约 1 亿桶油当量的可采天然气和凝析油储量，另外三个勘探区还可能蕴含更多储量【原文：Halten East's six existing discoveries contain recoverable gas and condensate reserves of around 100 million barrels of oil equivalent, with potential for more from a further three prospects】

item.title: Energean 资产出售因监管障碍而岌岌可危
item.description: Energean 向 Carlyle International Energy Partners 实体出售意大利、克罗地亚和埃及资产的 9.45 亿美元交易必须在 3 月 20 日前获得相关监管部门的批准【原文：Energean's $945 million deal to offload assets in Italy, Croatia and Egypt to Carlyle International Energy Partners entity has to secure relevant regulatory approvals by 20 March】

item.title: 经过 10 个月的钻探作业，巴基斯坦探测器测试出碳氢化合物
item.description: OGDC 的 Soghri North-1 号勘探井流出天然气和凝析油【原文：OGDC's Soghri North-1 exploration well flows gas and condensate】

item.title: 欧洲将深化与美国的能源安全关系
item.description: 尽管欧洲防务开支发生了变化，而且由美国斡旋达成的停火协议也已摆上桌面，但欧盟委员会仍承诺继续进口美国液化天然气，以替代俄罗斯管道天然气。【原文：Despite the shift in gears on European defence spending and a US-brokered ceasefire deal on the table, the European Commission remains committed to maintaining US LNG imports as a replacement for Russian pipeline gas】

item.title: 伍德赛德（Woodside）是否即将参股纳米比亚的大型勘探项目？

item.title: COSL 钻机启航前往巴西巴西石油公司（Petrobras）执行任务
item.description: 该钻井平台是价值 3 亿美元的巴西近海深水勘探合同的一部分，从 2025 年开始，它将在水深达 600 米的水域作业。【原文：The rig is part of a $300 million contract covering deepwater exploration offshore Brazil, where it will operate in water depths of up to 600 metres starting in 2025.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加州州长表示，阿拉斯加液化天然气最快将于 2030 年开始出口，此前将与潜在的亚洲合作伙伴进行谈判
item.description: 阿拉斯加州州长迈克-邓利维（Mike Dunleavy）将前往亚洲，与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）支持的拟议中的价值 440 亿美元的液化天然气出口项目的潜在合作伙伴进行会谈。【原文：Alaska Governor Mike Dunleavy will travel to Asia for talks with potential partners for the proposed $44 billion LNG export project, which is supported by US President Donald Trump】

item.description: 路透社报道称，该银行周四召开闭门会议讨论液化项目，并批准了这笔巨额贷款。【原文：Reuters reports the bank - which held a closed-door meeting on Thursday to discuss the liquefaction project - rubber-stamped the big loan】

item.title: 法罗群岛将石油希望寄托在英国罗斯班克开发项目上
item.description: 东北大西洋群岛希望附近的英国北海罗斯班克（Rosebank）和坎博（Cambo）油田的开发能为发展自己的石油工业提供机会【原文：The North-East Atlantic archipelago is hoping development of the nearby Rosebank and Cambo fields in the UK North Sea will provide opportunities for developing its own oil industry】
